```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

# Load libraries
library(tidyverse)
library(cowplot)
library(ggsci)
library(reshape2)
```


## Read in training results

```{r read_input}
input.path <- "/Users/lelo/Desktop/Munchkin/ETH/Master Thesis/CISI_IMC/tests/data/simulation_results.txt"

training_results <- read.delim(input.path)
```


## Best versions according to evaluation metric

```{r best_results}
best_result <- melt(training_results, id.vars=c("version")) %>%
  group_by(variable) %>%
  mutate(label=ifelse(max(value)==value, version, ""))

ggplot(best_result, aes(x=variable, y=value, label=label)) +
  geom_boxplot(aes(fill=variable), show.legend=FALSE) +
  geom_text(nudge_x=0.15) +
  scale_fill_npg() +
  theme_cowplot() +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, vjust = 0.5, hjust=1)) +
  labs(x="", y="")
```
